product_name: Kryptonite Evolution Mini-7 U-Lock with 4 ft. Flex Cable
long_description: Combining the robust protection of the Evolution Mini-7 U-Lock with a versatile and flexible 4 ft. Flex Cable, this package deal offers great value and convenient security for your bike. 13mm MAX-Performance hardened steel shackle on U-lock resists bolt cutters and leverage attacks; crossbar and cylinder have a reinforced cuff for added security. Disc-style cylinder delivers high security protection that is pick- and drill-resistant. Centrally placed key slot offers added defense against leverage attacks; rotating dust cover protects and extends the life of the lock's internals. Comes with 3 stainless steel keys; 1 key features a built-in light with a high-intensity bulb and replaceable battery. Included 4 ft. KryptoFlex(TM) 10mm-thick braided steel, double-loop cable provides good cut resistance for securing a front wheel or accessories. Protective vinyl coatings on both the U-lock and cable won't harm your bike's finish. Includes versatile mounting bracket for easy transportation; anti-rattle bumpers reduce noise during transport. Kryptonite rates the Evolution Mini-7 U-lock and Flex cable combo as a 7 on a 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security.
short_description: Combining the robust protection of the Evolution Mini-7 U-Lock with a versatile and flexible 4 ft. Flex Cable, this package deal offers great value and convenient security for your bike.
